Package EntityObject

Class Course

java.lang.Object
EntityObject.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a course available to students
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Course

      public Course​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school, java.util.Hashtable<DayOfWeek,​java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime>> lectureTimings, Venue lectureVenue, int AUs, java.util.ArrayList<Index> indexes)
      Creates a course object containing course specific information. Course information to be set by administrative user
      Parameters:
      courseCode - A String containing the unique identifier of the course with 2 alphabets followed by 4 digits.
      courseName - A String containing the name of the course
      school - An Enum value of the school that is offering the course
      lectureTimings - A Hashtable with the lecture day and the list of start and end timings of a lecture session as the key and value respectively
      lectureVenue - An Enum value of the lecture venue for all lecture sessions
      AUs - An integer that represents the number of academic units of the course
      indexes - A TreeMap with an index number and its corresponding index object as key and value respectively
      See Also:
      School, Venue

      public int getAUs()
      Gets the number of academic units (AUs) of the course.

    • checkVacancies

      public int checkVacancies​(int indexNumber) throws NonExistentIndexException
      Gets the vacancies of an index object from the indexes TreeMap. If the index object is null, throw a NonExistentIndexException error.
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - An integer that represents the index number of the index object to be checked for
      Returns:
      vacancies of the index group specified
      Throws:
      NonExistentIndexException - non existent index
      See Also:
      Index.getVacancy()

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(Index index)
      Adds an index object to the indexes TreeMap.
      Parameters:
      index - An Index object to be added to the course

    • deleteIndex

      public void deleteIndex​(int indexNumber) throws NonExistentIndexException
      Deletes an index object from the indexes TreeMap.
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - An integer representing the index group number
      Throws:
      NonExistentIndexException - Throws Exception when there is a non existent index

    • getIndex

      public Index getIndex​(int indexNumber)
      Retrieves an index object from the indexes TreeMap.
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - An integer that represents the index number of the index object to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Index object with the specified index number

    • getListOfIndexNumbers

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getListOfIndexNumbers()
      Retrieves index numbers of the course.
      Returns:
      List containing strings of index numbers

    • updateIndex

      public void updateIndex​(Index index)
      Updates the information of an existing index object. Replaces the existing Index object in the indexes TreeMap with an Index object containing updated information on the index group.
      Parameters:
      index - object with update information

    • isClashing

      public boolean isClashing​(Course c)
      Determines if there is a clash in lecture timings between two courses. Loops through the lecture days in the Lecture Timings TreeMap to check if there is an overlap in lecture timings with another course on any particular day.
      Parameters:
      c - course to check against
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if there is a clash in lecture timings
      See Also:
      clashingTimetable(Hashtable, Hashtable, DayOfWeek)

    • isClashing

      public boolean isClashing​(Index i)
      Determines if there is a clash in timings between the laboratory and tutorial sessions (if any) of a given index and the lecture timings of the course. Loops through the lecture days in the Lecture Timings TreeMap to check if there is an overlap in timings with the laboratory or tutorial sessions of a given index on any particular day.
      Parameters:
      i - index to check against
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if there is a clash in timings
      See Also:
      clashingTimetable(Hashtable, Hashtable, DayOfWeek)

    • allInfoToString

      public java.lang.String allInfoToString()
      Builds a String containing all course information. Loops through the indexes TreeMap to get index numbers of all index groups.
      Returns:
      A String containing the course code, course name, school, lecture timings and venue and index numbers
      See Also:
      School, Venue

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Builds a String containing basic course information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      A String containing the course code, course name and school
      See Also:
      School
